markers.marker: Lore stuff, in short: Anankos is both evil and not evil at the same time because reasons. Mentioning both in the same game might be kinda confusing so yea..
Taking off the armor is quite a hassle for poor Corrin, but she complained about it a bit too often for my liking.
Arthur is a character in FE:Fates, known for his terrible luck.
Big breasts are heavy and might hurt your back later, Corrin is concerned about you.

Quote "Those books weren't lying!" when a male large crotch is visible. It's been hinted at that Nyx (character in FE:Fates, the one I referenced to about the Strip Poker book in Corrin's other lines) likes reading erotic novels, maybe Corrin stole some of them? :p
Corrin's army camp. She spent quite a bit of time here in between battles.
Quote: "These cards don't match with any of the combos I read about... Maybe it is a hidden one?" When she has a bad hand.
Corrin's sword is basically a magical chainsaw. That's kinda creepy but badass at the same time.
"Charlotte Pose" Charlotte is a character in FE:Fates. Her official art has her in an... interesting pose, a pose I tried to recreate as the 6-help pose
1-stripped: "Here you go! you can try [my gloves] on if you like, they are really comfy!" Probably doesn't do anything, but hey.
Giant penises are scary, especially kisekae's giant penises. Corrin fears you might be cursed
Corrin asks if a character is intentionally taking something bigger off. I used it to get a followup that makes sense but marked it so you can do something with it if you want it.
Corrin can turn into a dragon (well, more like a deer-dragon hybrid IMO), that's basically it.
A dragonstone is needed for Corrin to transform into a dragon.
Because she gets really competitive in stage 4, Corrin forgets that losers have to masturbate
Corrin gets really horny when a guy starts masturbating when she's masturbating as well
Corrin doesn't want people to go easy on her in this game, I marked every instance where she says it (except the victory lines of course)
Quote "Your ~clothing~? That's a good choice!" After someone takes something off.
Greeting another character at the start of the game, might become awkward if she does it every turn.
Referencing Mitama, a character in FE:Fates who basically only speaks in haiku. I'm way too proud of myself for actually doing this.

Corrin's army camp has hot springs. The springs are unisex so it's possible (and likely) for you to "accindentally" walk into the springs when members of the opposing gender are bathing (good shit, nintendo/IntSys)
"Justice is just an illusion" is a quote in FE:Fates, I referenced it.
Quote: "I'm just going to call this "learning by doing"". When she has a bad hand.
She mentions her shirt in a "good_hand" quote, mentioning it again in a stripping quote is not needed.
"Oh you looked good wearing that..." type of lines when someone takes something off.
Corrin makes this comment when someone reveals their small breasts. "Hi..." in this sentence is Hinoka, Corrin's older sister. (and best Hoshido girl, fight me)
Corrin thinks of her hairband as her Lucky Charm for whatever reason. A character in FE:Fates, called Benny, makes Charms for people he likes, so it is a bit of a reference to him
Referencing the "Dragon Looks in Mirror, Falls in Love w/Reflection" thing because it's cute.
Marks her specifically mentioning her necklace in 3-strip
Calls back on the "forgot" marker.
Calls back on the "fuckme" marker.

Quote "It is just like the book said, "To win one does not need the best hand, simply not having the worst hand is enough to achieve victory." She shouldn't repeat this line, also you can react I guess.
Corrin is fine with losing some times, she can help others with it!
Corrin encourages the player to "play safer", as if that's possible in strip poker, but whatever, what does she know
Saying you've got a good start, even though 5 rounds have already passed is kind of dumb. shc stands for Start Hand Comment.
Quote "Small things count? That's nice to know!" When someone takes off a small thing, added for later use in her dialogue but if you find another use, go for it.
"Small Penis Humiliation". Appearently some people are into that so yeah.
Strategy guides for Strip Poker are a thing, appearently.
At first, Corrin is surprised people have to masturbate in this game. (SuMas=Surprise Masturbation)
Quote "That is bigger than my sword!" when a male large crotch is visible. Too easy, had to do it.
Corrin was the commander (sort of) in a war, this war was the main plot point in Fire Emblem Fates.
Commenting on how warm it is in wherever they are playing
Corrin doesn't quite get how the game works at the beginning, so she asks what happens when someone loses a hand for the first time. (coupled with timeInStage:0)
Korra's "Bending" is not something Corrin is familiar with.
One of Corrin's more memorable battle quotes, also a taunt in Smash 4.
